name: Pokémon DR
overview: Storyline: Diamond/Platinum travel in the Kanto region with your rival. But, Team Rocket has returned and you must face off against them again. You can battle with Red, and join the Kanto cup and a new event. Features: • Kanto & Sinnoh regions • Pokedex: 241 • New hero and rival • Some new music • New moves • New items: Ice Stone, Trade Dv...etc • Modified evolutions: - Leaf stone = Leafeon - Ice Stone = Glaceon - Sun Stone = Espeon - Moon Stone = Umbreon - Changed trade evoluton
